user_utterance: Hi, can you give me any recommendations for a Japanese TV drama?

system_utterance: Ok, maybe Quartet is a good choice.

system_utterance: It premiered on January 17, 2017.

user_utterance: How about its Douban rating?
system_utterance: Its Douban rating is 9.1.

user_utterance: Who directed it?

user_utterance: How about its runtime?
system_utterance: It is 172 minutes.

user_utterance: Ok, thank you so much, bye,
system_utterance: You are welcome. Hope you enjoy my recommendations.

user_utterance: Hi, my friends are coming to visit me. Are there any scenic areas near Gusu District that are not that expensive?
system_utterance: Alright, if you want to hang out with your friends, Humble Administrator's Garden is a nice place. It is a traditional Suzhou-style garden and also near to your home.

user_utterance: Good, where is it?
system_utterance: The Humble Administrator's Garden is at No. 178 Dongbei Street, Gusu District, Suzhou City.

alignment.No. 178 Dongbei Street, Gusu District, S: 苏州市姑苏区东北街178号

user_utterance: How about its rating online?
system_utterance: Let me have a look. It got a score of 4.5, for your reference.

user_utterance: Ok, we may spend the whole day together, can you recommend some a bit more expensive restaurants near here?
system_utterance: Well, Banyuan Private Home Cuisine is a good choice. It is a bit more expensive and serves Jiangsu Zhejiang Cuisine with local features.

user_utterance: Ok, can you check the address and phone number of it? Is it near a subway station?
system_utterance: The restaurant is at No. 3 Chuanfang Alley, North of Pingjiang Road. The phone number is 139-6217-0368. There is no direct subway line to it.

user_utterance: Well, are there any other transportation options?
system_utterance: You can take other public transportation or drive there, both are convenient.

user_utterance: Ok, thanks for your service, see you.
system_utterance: You are welcome. Phone me any time you need help, goodbye.

user_utterance: Hello, I want to buy a gas-powered SUV, can you recommend one within RMB 150,000?

system_utterance: Sure, it has.

system_utterance: Sorry, this model does not have this function.

user_utterance: Got it. Thanks, bye.

user_utterance: Hi, how's it going? My friend will come to Suzhou and I want to find an a bit more expensive restaurant where I could take him. It would be nice if it is near Suzhou Industrial Park. Do you have any recommendations?

system_utterance: No problems. It is open from Monday to Sunday, 09:00-07:00.

user_utterance: Wow, it is open all night, then we can stay a bit longer. Could you find a not that expensive hotel with standard rooms?

system_utterance: It does have a high score of 4.7. Your friend will be pleased about it.

system_utterance: Yes, it has a free parking lot.

user_utterance: Perfect, thank you for your advice.
system_utterance: Sure, any other questions?

user_utterance: No, thank you again, bye.

How about the address?
system_utterance: It is at No. 118 Wansheng Street.

system_utterance: Yes, it has a CT scan.

system_utterance: You can take No.2, No.47, No.106, No.206, No.215, No.258, No.6, No.108, No.110, No.116, or No. 166 bus.

user_utterance: Got it, thank you so much. Bye.

system_utterance: In Changshu, Atour Hotel on Changjiang Road is suitable for you.

user_utterance: How much is a king-size room?

user_utterance: How much is the ticket? Is it free?

user_utterance: Thank you, bye.
system_utterance: Not at all, bye.

system_utterance: Almost. The maximum temperature will be 20 degrees Celsius, and the minimum temperature will be 12 degrees Celsius.

user_utterance: Hi, I'm a local in Suzhou but I'm not quite familiar with places for fun in local areas. My friend is coming to visit me. I plan to take him to an amusement park. Can you recommend a little more expensive one?

user_utterance: Is there anything special there?
